targets.rawSql: SELECT currency, sum(amount) as revenue FROM analytics.transaction_events_mv WHERE timestamp >= today() GROUP BY currency
SELECT toStartOfHour(timestamp) as time, sum(amount) as revenue FROM analytics.transaction_events_mv WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SELECT avg(amount) FROM analytics.transaction_events_mv WHERE timestamp >= today()

SELECT toStartOfHour(timestamp) as time, event_type, count(*) as count FROM analytics.interaction_events_mv WHERE event_type IN ('item_added_to_cart', 'item_removed_from_cart') AND timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR GROUP BY time, event_type ORDER BY time

SELECT item_id, count(*) as additions FROM analytics.interaction_events_mv WHERE event_type = 'item_added_to_cart' AND timestamp >= today() AND item_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY item_id ORDER BY additions DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT 'Page Views' as step, count(*) as count FROM analytics.interaction_events_mv WHERE event_type = 'page_view' AND timestamp >= today() UNION ALL SELECT 'Searches' as step, count(*) as count FROM analytics.interaction_events_mv WHERE event_type = 'search' AND timestamp >= today() UNION ALL SELECT 'Cart Additions' as step, count(*) as count FROM analytics.interaction_events_mv WHERE event_type = 'item_added_to_cart' AND timestamp >= today() UNION ALL SELECT 'Transactions' as step, count(*) as count FROM analytics.transaction_events_mv WHERE timestamp >= today()

SELECT form_name, count(*) as submissions FROM analytics.interaction_events_mv WHERE event_type = 'form_submit' AND timestamp >= today() AND form_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY form_name ORDER BY submissions DESC
